# Visual Studio files
.vscode/
*.code-workspace

# User-specific files
*.rsuser
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Auto-generated files
*.obj
*.exe
*.pdb
*.dll
*.log
*.vspscc
*.vssscc
*.cache
*.csproj.user
*.csproj.vspscc
*.csproj.vssscc

# Build folders
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/
[Ll]og/
out/

# Packages and Dependencies
packages/
node_modules/
.vs/

# Visual Studio database, libraries, and temp files
*.cache
*.pdb
*.class
*.ncb
*.sdf
*.opensdf
*.VC.db

# Publish and Generated Files
*.publish.xml
.publish/
*.publishproj
*.deployment

# Web specific
node_modules/
bower_components/
.DS_Store

# Miscellaneous files
*.log
*.tmp
*.tmp.*
*.bak
[Tt]emp/

# Backup and temporary files
*~.nib
*.swp
*.bak
*.bak~
*.sav
*.tlb
*.tlh
*.tmp
*.old
*.error
*.orig
